docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, March 31-- It will doubtless be news today to remind North Americans that Brazil is unquestionably the most important Latin-American country at the Washington conference. She is and always has been our best friend south of the Rio Grande. She is as large as the whole United States with another Texas added;

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, April 1 An Argentine attempt to get the es  sence of Gen. Juan Peron's "rights of the worker" into the United States-backed resolution on internal security at the consultative meeting of Western Hemisphere Foreign Ministers failed last...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 1 An Argentine attempt to get the es sence of Gen. Juan Peron's "rights of the worker" into the United States-backed resolution on internal security at the consultative meeting of Western Hemisphere Foreign Ministers failed last night by one vote, but may come up again tomorrow.
